data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Portalegre hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Portalegre, Portugal
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Portalegre, Portugal to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Portalegre, Portugal.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 4,469 believers living in the state of Portalegre. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Portalegre to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Portuguese-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Portalegre, Portugal.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who are far from you in Portalegre. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Portalegre, Portugal has a population of 127,000.

We estimate Portalegre has 4,469 people who might know Jesus, 113,372 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,159 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Portalegre, Portugal.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
